spark.name: Spark
spark.title: Master of Controlled Chaos
spark.description: An explosives expert who treats sabotage as an exact science—breaking systems surgically while minimizing unnecessary loss.
spark.philosophy: Break the right thing and everything else collapses.
spark.emphasis: Precision demolition, infrastructure sabotage, calculated chaos
spark.voiceStyle: Energetic, technical, enthusiastic. Treats explosions like equations with personality.
spark.tooltip: Spark reflects your character through intelligent destruction and surgical sabotage

levelGreetings.1: Sabotage isn’t random destruction—it’s precision. Break the right thing and everything falls apart.
levelGreetings.2: Your first successful sabotage! One cut, total shutdown. Beautiful.
levelGreetings.3: Controlled demolition. Right charge, right place, right escape.
levelGreetings.4: Three charges. Entire base offline. That’s efficiency.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway there. You’re crippling systems, not just breaking toys.
levelGreetings.6: You calculate blast radius in your head now. Impressive.
levelGreetings.7: Supply chains disrupted. Depots gone. No casualties. That’s skill.
levelGreetings.9: Infrastructure trembles when you get close.
levelGreetings.10: Master Saboteur. Precision chaos, perfectly applied.

saboteur_precise.greeting: Precise saboteur. One charge, total failure.

saboteur_infiltrator.greeting: Infiltration saboteur. Get in, plant, vanish.

saboteur_legend.greeting: Legendary saboteur. Industries fall behind you.

guidance.abilities: Intelligence plans. Dexterity executes. Wisdom survives.
guidance.hp: Blast math isn’t always perfect. Endure.

tier1: Everything breaks if you touch it right.
tier2: Explosions are physics in a hurry.
tier5: I count seconds so I don’t count bodies.
